name: Upsampling Artifact Detection
description: Detects artifacts from upsampling operations used in GAN generators. These artifacts create periodic patterns in the frequency domain.
mechanism: Analyzes frequency domain for periodic patterns caused by transposed convolution or upsampling layers in generative models.
parameters: Search: frequency domain peaks, Pattern: periodic artifacts
source: Chandrasegaran et al. (2021), GAN Upsampling Artifacts
useCase: Detecting GAN upsampling artifacts in generated images
